description:
Use your pen launcher to fire a bright red ball into the air to attract attention or guide rescuers to your location.

  • Includes six cartridges
  • Each flare reaches an altitude of 50 to 90m, and burns for 4 to 6 seconds
  • For use with 15mm centre-fire launchers only, not compatible with older rim-fire launchers
name: Tru Flare Red Flares (6 Pack)
